Capabilties:
Long Context Processing: It supports a context window of 1 million tokens, which is 8 times that of the previous GPT-4o. It can accurately locate target texts at any depth in the corpus and performs excellently even when facing long texts of 1 million tokens.
Complex Dialogue Understanding: In the Multi - Round Coreference test, GPT - 4.1 shows strong understanding and reasoning abilities through synthetic dialogue. It can accurately find specific content in complex dialogues.
Use Case: Thomson Reuters' professional AI assistant CoCounsel uses GPT - 4.1. GPT - 4.1 performs excellently in multi - document review. Compared with GPT - 4o, its accuracy in internal long - context benchmark tests for multi - document review is increased by 17%.
